me athara watup wishamatha gataluwa sambandhayen guru - widuhalpathi wruththiya samithi sandhanaya ada agramathyawaraya hamuwimatada niyamithayi.watup wishamatha gataluwak mul kara ganimin guru - widuhalpathi wruththiya samithi aarambha kara onlayin panthi warjanayata me wanawita masa 3ka kalayak sampurna wanawa.janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapakshage pradhanathwayen janadhipathi karyaleydi eeye rathriye pawathwunu amathya mandala sakachjawedi guru widuhalpathi watup wishamatha iwath kirime nawa yojanawa labana masa 12 wani da parlimenthuwata idiripath kerena ayawaya lekhanayata athulath kirimatada thiranaya kara athi bawa sandahan.guru widuhalpathi watup wishamathawa iwath kirima adiyara 4kin sidu kirimata rajaya mita pera thiranaya kara thibu athara guru ha widuhalpathi wruththiya samithi eeta wirodhaya pala kara thibuna.me athara watup wishamatha gataluwa pilibada sakachcha kirima sandaha guru - widuhalpathi wruththiya samithi sandhanaya ada dahawal araliyagaha mandirayedi agramathyawaraya samaga wishesha sakachchawak pawathwimata niyamithayi.
ee nisama me gamana apita ithama wadagath wagema kuthuhalaya danawana gamanak wima walakwimata nohaki wiya.
